snippet: A Hong Kong newspaper admitted that a story that was almost too good to be true was, in fact, not.
abstract: Hong Kong newspaper admits story about Chinese Pres  Xi Jinping taking an incognito  taxi ride, that was almost too good to be true was, in fact, not; some Chinese at first praised Xi's reported yearning to share pain, and congested streets, of frustrated public, while others found it unbelievable.

byline.contributor: Jonathan Ansfield contributed reporting from Beijing. Mia Li contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: A Hong Kong newspaper admitted that a story that was almost too good to be true was, in fact, not.

headline.seo: Tale of China’s Leader in a Taxicab Is Retracted
headline.main: President Xi Takes a Taxi? Yes, Too Good to Be True
headline.print_headline: President Xi Takes a Taxi? Yes, Too Good To Be True
